Description.Text: Val Girard is a modern 3-star hotel offering contemporary accommodation near the heart of Paris. It boasts free Wi-Fi and an excellent location within walking distance of Ecole Militaire and the Champ de Mars park. The hotel is located just off Rue Lecourbe. Vaugirard is a lively former village built along a Roman road that was annexed to Paris in 1860. Nearby places of interest include the landmark skyscraper Tour Montparnasse, the Champ de Mars park and the magnificent Eiffel Tower. Vaugirard metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Paris destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise property featuring a mansard roof and an elegant, light coloured facade with wrought iron faux balconies. There are no leisure facilities onsite, but free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are elegantly decorated in a range of tasteful colour schemes and feature dark wood furnishings and artwork displayed above the bed. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe, work desk and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature a shower. There is no restaurant onsite, but a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. There are also plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
